Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We received the online portion of your application for NY NOW® and are happy to hear of your interest in Handmade® Designer Maker!
Handmade is a juried section of the market and as such applications are reviewed by an independent selection committee. To be considered for this section for winter 2020, you must submit a comprehensive application packet via mail to arrive in our office by no later than October 15.
Please submit the following materials via mail for review:
• Designer bio/company statement​ • Specific information on where, by whom and how products are designed and made • Catalog/brochure with wholesale pricing • Booth display photo/rendering • Sample list of customers
In addition, you may visit our website to view "tips on applying to a juried section": http://www.nynow.com/exhibitors/tips-on-applying
All applications should be mailed to the following address:
Emerald Expositions / NY NOW ATTN: Handmade Designer Maker 1133 Westchester Avenue, Suite N210 White Plains, NY 10604-3547
Should you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us. Otherwise, we look forward to receiving your application!
Sincerely,
NY NOW
Ashley Ciofrone | Sales Manager | 914-421-3310 Desiree Weissgerber | Sales Representative | 914-421-3289 Allison Garafalo | Sales Director | 914-421-3212
